channel.title: Donations on Sea Scouts BSA Ship 84
channel.description: Recent content in Donations on Sea Scouts BSA Ship 84

item.title: Donation cancelled
item.description: Your donation was cancelled. If this was by mistake, please try again. If you are having technical difficulties, please contact the Skipper of Ship 84.

item.title: Thank You for your Donation
item.description: Your donation was successful. We grately appreciate your donation. Your donation to Ship 84 may be tax deductible.
